# uniqueID

**Instance Property**

A unique ID for the device.

## Declaration

```swift
let uniqueID: String?
```

## Discussion

Use `uniqueID` to facilitate driver matching, or client matching using [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDDeviceManager].
title: uniqueID
